description: Creates or updates the specified trusted identity provider. During update, the trusted identity provider with the specified name will be replaced with this new provider

properties.description: The trusted identity provider properties to use when creating a new trusted identity provider.

subscription_id.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

account_name.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account.

trusted_id_provider_name.description: The name of the trusted identity provider. This is used for differentiation of providers in the account.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or replace the trusted identity provider.
